description: The Entombment; Niccolo Ricciolini (Italian, 1687 - 1772); Netherlands; about 1760; Brush drawing in light brown wash over black chalk, heightened with white and some pink gouache, with occasional touches of pen and brown ink; some framing lines ruled in brown ink and the edges of the sheet; 38.4 x 25.4 cm (15 1/8 x 10 in.); 87.GG.14; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
medium: Brush drawing in light brown wash over black chalk, heightened with white and some pink gouache, with occasional touches of pen and brown ink; some framing lines ruled in brown ink and the edges of the sheet
